Title: [M1 Epic] Project Setup & Tooling
Description: Initialize repo scaffolding, dev tooling, and execution workflow for Claude Code + Linear.

Title: Repo scaffold (folders + basic modules)
Description: Create top-level folders: ingest/, process/, kg/, measures/, model/, notebooks/, data_manifests/, docs/. Add placeholder __init__.py where needed.

Title: Python environment + dependency management
Description: Set up uv or poetry, pin versions, add requirements lock, and document setup in README.

Title: Code quality tooling
Description: Add ruff/black (or ruff format), pre-commit hooks, and basic lint targets.

Title: Makefile/task runner
Description: Create make targets: setup, build-db, transform, signals, train, notebook (stubs ok initially).

Title: .gitignore + data layout
Description: Ignore data/external, data/interim, data/processed; keep data_manifests/ tracked.

Title: Logging + config pattern
Description: Add structured logging and config pattern (YAML/TOML + env overrides).

Title: [M1 Epic] Requirements & DoD Lock
Description: Freeze scope decisions, acceptance questions, MVP doc count target, and policies in docs/ and README.

Title: Write acceptance questions (10–15)
Description: Define concrete KG questions to validate usefulness (coverage, trends, top capabilities, risk shifts, etc.).

Title: Finalize MVP doc count + mix
Description: Set MVP to 300–500 docs; define target mix (SEC, transcripts, press/blog, media).

Title: Public-only source policy doc
Description: Document allowed/disallowed sources + fallback strategy for analyst/paywalled content.

Title: Ground-truth plan doc
Description: Document thin gold set plan (~50 docs / ~500 sentences) and precision-focused evaluation.

Title: Leakage-proof modeling plan doc
Description: Write the as-of / lagging rules, time splits, and leakage checks in docs/modeling.md.

Title: Risk register doc
Description: Create docs/risk_register.md using the table in README; add mitigations and owners (optional).

Title: [M2 Epic] Source Inventory & Crawl Rules
Description: Define allowed domains, URL seeds, crawl constraints, and compliance controls (robots.txt, rate limits).

Title: Allowed domains allowlist
Description: Create allowlist (e.g., sec.gov, workday.com, investor relations host, etc.).

Title: Seed URL lists (CSV)
Description: Create data_manifests/seeds/*.csv for SEC filings, IR pages, press, blog, transcripts, media.

Title: URL normalization + de-dupe rules
Description: Define canonicalization, stripping tracking params, and duplicate detection strategy.

Title: Robots.txt + ToS compliance checks
Description: Implement robots.txt check and add user-agent + contact header strategy.

Title: Rate limiting strategy
Description: Implement per-domain throttling, retries with backoff, and polite concurrency limits.

Title: [M2 Epic] Ingestion & Raw Metadata Capture
Description: Fetch public HTML/PDF, store locally (ignored by git), and persist manifest metadata in Postgres.

Title: Create raw document storage layout
Description: Implement data/external/{html,pdf}/... plus content-hash naming.

Title: Implement fetcher for HTML
Description: Fetch HTML with headers, retries, store raw response, capture status + hash.

Title: Implement fetcher for PDF
Description: Download PDFs, store raw bytes, capture mime + hash + size.

Title: Document manifest table (raw_documents)
Description: Create table for url, fetched_at, status, mime, hash, size, title (if any).

Title: Write manifest export (CSV)
Description: Export reproducible manifest to data_manifests/documents.csv (no raw content).

Title: Ingest CLI entrypoint
Description: Create CLI: python -m ingest.run --seeds ... --since 2015 --limit N.

Title: [M3 Epic] Document Processing & Classification
Description: Extract clean text, classify doc type, extract metadata, sentence-split, and persist intermediates locally.

Title: HTML to clean text
Description: Implement readability/boilerplate removal and normalized text output.

Title: PDF to text
Description: Implement PDF text extraction and capture page count + extraction warnings.

Title: Document type classifier
Description: Rule-based classifier: SEC filing, transcript, press release, blog, media, event.

Title: Publish date extraction
Description: Extract publish date from metadata/body; store best-guess + confidence.

Title: Sentence segmentation
Description: Split into sentences with stable IDs for evidence spans.

Title: Processed artifacts layout
Description: Store processed text + sentence JSONL in data/interim (gitignored).

Title: [M3 Epic] KG Schema & Loaders
Description: Implement Postgres KG schema, migrations, and idempotent loaders with provenance fields.

Title: Design KG tables + relationships
Description: DDL for documents, products, capabilities, risk_topics, events, mentions (with evidence).

Title: Set up migrations
Description: Use Alembic (or equivalent) for schema versioning; add init migration.

Title: Idempotent upsert loaders
Description: Implement upserts for documents/entities/edges keyed by stable IDs + hashes.

Title: Provenance & evidence fields everywhere
Description: Ensure source_url, extracted_at, extractor_version, evidence_text, sentence_id exist on edges.

Title: Deduplication strategy
Description: Handle duplicates via content_hash and canonical URL mapping.

Title: [M4 Epic] Signal Engineering
Description: Compute quarterly signals: AI intensity, product/capability trends, risk density, events.

Title: AI-language detection (ruleset v1)
Description: Keyword/phrase ruleset with sentence-level flags and doc-level counts.

Title: Risk-language detection (ruleset v1)
Description: Risk lexicon + filing section heuristics; sentence-level flags and doc-level counts.

Title: Product/capability mention extraction v1
Description: Dictionary-based entity matching with normalization; store mention edges w/ evidence.

Title: Quarterly aggregation tables
Description: Create quarterly rollups for each signal + coverage metrics.

Title: Media proxy signal
Description: Define one media-derived proxy (e.g., AI mention share in media vs total).

Title: [M4 Epic] Validation & Coverage Analysis
Description: Create thin gold set, compute precision, and document coverage/limitations.

Title: Sample docs + sentences for audit
Description: Select ~50 docs; sample ~500 sentences across AI/risk/product candidates.

Title: Label audit set CSV template
Description: Create CSV schema for manual labeling; provide instructions in docs/validation.md.

Title: Compute precision metrics
Description: Calculate precision for AI/risk/product detection; output markdown report.

Title: Coverage report
Description: Compute coverage by year/source type; identify gaps vs MVP targets.

Title: [M5 Epic] Feature Engineering
Description: Create time-safe feature tables using lagging and as-of joins.

Title: Define target + label generation
Description: Define next-quarter up/down return label and how it’s computed.

Title: Lagged feature builder
Description: Build features from t-4..t-1 quarters only; enforce as-of timestamps.

Title: Train/val/test split generator
Description: Implement chronological splits: train 2015–2019, val 2020–2021, test 2022–present.

Title: Leakage checks
Description: Add assertions: no feature uses docs after label cutoff; unit tests for time joins.

Title: [M5 Epic] Predictive Modeling & Evaluation
Description: Train interpretable baselines and evaluate with time-series methodology.

Title: Baseline model (logistic regression)
Description: Train baseline, persist metrics, confusion matrix, ROC-AUC where applicable.

Title: Second baseline (tree model optional)
Description: Train random forest or xgboost-lite; compare to baseline.

Title: Feature importance report
Description: Coefficients / permutation importance; save report to docs/model_results.md.

Title: Model reproducibility artifact
Description: Save model + config + feature schema; ensure reruns are deterministic.

Title: [M6 Epic] Notebook Demo
Description: Create a single notebook that demonstrates KG coverage, signals, queries, and model results.

Title: Notebook scaffold (01_demo.ipynb)
Description: Create notebook with sections: overview, signals, queries, modeling results, interpretation.

Title: KG overview visuals
Description: Entity counts, docs over time, coverage by source type.

Title: Signal plots
Description: Plot quarterly AI intensity, risk density, product/capability mentions.

Title: Example KG queries
Description: 3–5 example SQL queries answering acceptance questions.

Title: Model results section
Description: Show metrics and feature importance; short narrative interpretation.

Title: [M6 Epic] Documentation & Finalization
Description: Finalize reproducibility, compliance, and project narrative for submission.

Title: README final pass
Description: Ensure README matches implemented commands + repo structure.

Title: Architecture/pipeline doc
Description: Write docs/architecture.md with pipeline diagram (optional) and data flow explanation.

Title: Risk register final pass
Description: Confirm mitigations implemented; add any newly discovered risks.

Title: Limitations & ethics section
Description: Document data drift, extraction uncertainty, and interpretation limits.

Title: Release checklist
Description: Add submission checklist: commands run, notebook runs, screenshots/plots, final artifacts.
